title: Hope fanatic beats tsm... and im NA
body: I dont hate tsm, I just really dislike fans that jump on the tsm bandwagon cause everyone else likes em. Fanatic is also the most fun lcs team to watch by far. Tsm just has been around enough to throw money at talent. I respect the shit outta dyrus (keep it real man) Btw not gonna check responses at all and haven't posted anything on these "boards" since they first came out:) have a nice day

why do people talks about eu vs na we should be rooting for our western team to beat asian teams instend of fighting to determinate na or eu is better

Everyone on the tsm bandwagon ? Lol ? We could say the same thing about FNC and UOL. You don't make any sense. The fact, that you won't check responses on your thread just confirm that you are troll. 

Have a nice day brah

Why the hell do we have to specify something like this:

"Hope fanatic beats tsm... and im NA"

This just seems that the community as a whole has degenerated to the state a primitive pissing contests.

If you are NA, you have to like TSM or C9.
If you are EU, you have to like Fnatic or that new Origen (with former Fnatic Player xPeke).

Why can't I be NA and not like TSM? or be EU and Hate Fnatic?

All of this NA>EU or EU>NA stuff is also ridiculous.

Everyone needs to grow up, like the teams they like and leave everyone else alone.

To an extent, I can sympathize with the Original Poster, but he is generalizing a fanbase. Not every fan of TSM is a tool. Not every fan of Fnatic is a nice guy.

Also, what's the point of posting on the forums if you are not going to check the responses to a topic you created...that just seems weird.
